response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its high value to you at $8,000, I propose we discuss a fair deal that respects both our interests. Considering the product's unique features and market value, I suggest we aim for a price closer to its actual cost to me, which is around $12,000. This way, you get a great deal while ensuring I can cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Let's schedule a call to further discuss this opportunity and explore ways to make it mutually beneficial. Looking forward to your response!", "product_price": 12000}
